transitionType.title: Stage Transition Type
transitionType.content: Choose how to move this case through its lifecycle: Forward advances to the next stage, Send Back returns to a previous stage for corrections, and Remand/Reopen restarts the current stage workflow.

forward.title: Forward Stage Transition
forward.content: Advances the case to the next stage in the lifecycle after completing all required prerequisites and checklist items.

sendBack.title: Send Back to Previous Stage
sendBack.content: Returns the case to an earlier stage when corrections or additional work is needed. Requires a reason for the reversal.

remand.title: Remand/Reopen Stage
remand.content: Restarts the current stage workflow when new information requires re-processing without moving to a different stage.

currentStage.title: Current Case Stage
currentStage.content: The stage where this case currently resides in its lifecycle. Each stage has specific requirements and timelines.

nextStage.title: Next Stage Selection
nextStage.content: Select the target stage for this transition. Available stages depend on the current stage and transition type selected.

stageComments.title: Stage Transition Notes
stageComments.content: Document the reason for this stage transition, any important context, decisions made, or instructions for the next stage owner. This creates an audit trail.

prerequisites.title: Stage Prerequisites
prerequisites.content: Required conditions that must be met before advancing to the next stage. These ensure compliance and completeness of case work.

checklist.title: Stage Checklist
checklist.content: Tasks and requirements that must be completed for this stage transition. Some items can be manually attested or overridden with proper justification.

checklistItem.title: Checklist Item
checklistItem.content: Individual requirement for stage completion. Auto-checked items are verified by the system. Manual items require your attestation.

orderDetails.title: Order Details
orderDetails.content: Enter information about the court order, including order number, date, and key provisions. This information is critical for compliance tracking.

reasonForSendBack.title: Reason for Reversal
reasonForSendBack.content: Select the primary reason why this case is being sent back to an earlier stage. This helps track quality issues and process improvements.

caseDetails.title: Case Information
caseDetails.content: Summary of key case information including case number, title, client, and current assignment. Review before making stage transitions.
